title: Technical Documentation Completeness Review
description: Audits existing documentation for gaps, outdated content, and missing sections, providing prioritized improvement plan.
template:
Review documentation completeness for {{project_name}}.

1. Audit existing documentation:
   - README (setup, usage, architecture overview)
   - API documentation (endpoints, schemas, examples)
   - Architecture diagrams and design docs
   - Deployment and operations guides
   - Troubleshooting guides
   - Contributing guidelines
2. Identify gaps and outdated content
3. Assess documentation quality:
   - Clarity and completeness
   - Code examples and accuracy
   - Diagrams and visuals
   - Searchability and organization
4. Prioritize by audience (developers, operators, users)
5. Create documentation improvement plan
6. Suggest automation opportunities (API doc generation, ADRs)
7. Define documentation standards

Current docs location: {{docs_location}}
Target audience: {{target_audience}}

Output: Gap Analysis | Prioritized Improvement Plan | Doc Standards | Templates

docs_location.description: Location of current documentation (e.g., /docs, wiki, confluence)

examples.output_outline: Gaps: missing architecture diagrams, outdated API examples (v1 vs v3), no troubleshooting guide, deployment guide incomplete, no ADRs, priorities: HIGH-update API docs, HIGH-add architecture overview, MEDIUM-create runbooks, LOW-style guide, recommendations: use OpenAPI for API docs, Mermaid for diagrams, ADR template, 60-hour effort
